greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k|n, k<=sqrt(n)} mu(k) where mu(k) is the Moebius function and the sum is over the positive divisors k of n with k <= sqrt(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} mu(k)*x^(k^2)/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 03 2017
mathematica: Table[DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu, # <= Sqrt[n] &], {n, 103}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Sep 24 2017 *)
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Mar 22 2002
